* Carnage looked down at the ground as she hung from the Rage's jaw, she 
didn't see Cyber Claw transform and frankly was better off not seeing 
it...at the moment.
She then began to move towards Rage's mouth where now a transformer lay 
trapped, she swung and she moved like she was climbing a set of organic 
monkey bars.
Finally, with a great deal of effort, Carnage managed to heave herself onto 
the Rage's snout, peered over the edge of her nose and looked down at the 
transformer locked in her jaws.....Carnage nearly fell off in shock!!
What she stared at was a female version of Dinobot, it even smelled like he 
use to!
Carnage then snarled after she scanned the trapped bot, this was no REAL 
transformer...this was a slagin CLONE!Obviously the Transmetal 2 clone of 
Dinobot wasn't enough and Megatron had to go and create something more 
closer to the real Dinobot, only in a female form.
Carnage was deeply offended!*

" Son of a bitch! I'll rip his core-processor out for this!!!"

* Carnage snarled as she pulled her head back up and sighed, clone or not it 
still deserved a chance to live!
She looked back and stared right into one of Rage's blood red eyes, BINGO!
Carnage leaped and drove her hind claws towards the unprotected eye, she 
could have thrown up at the disgusting sound it made when she finally came 
into contact with it!*
